General.Name: Nam Sung
General.Description: Namsung Corp. manufactures and trades in electronic products under the DUAL brand in South Korea. The company offers mobile audio and video, DVD navigation, multi-media HD radio, XM satellite receiver radio, and digital AMP wireless headphone products. It is also involved in the department store and wholesale/retail distribution and rental businesses. The company was founded in 1965 and is based in Seoul, South Korea.
